題.definition: topic; problem for discussion; exam question; subject; to inscribe; to mention; CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

題字.definition: to write an inscription (poem, remark, autograph etc); an inscription

題寫.definition: to create a work of calligraphy for display in a prominent place (typically, a sign)

題序.definition: to compose a preface (or introductory remarks, etc); question (or section) order (on an exam paper); question (or section) number

題庫.definition: question bank (for examiners creating an exam, or students preparing for an exam)

題意.definition: meaning of a title; implication; theme

題獻.definition: to dedicate (a book, film etc to sb)

題目.definition: subject; title; topic (CL:個|个[ge4]); exercise or exam question (CL:道[dao4])

題簽.definition: to write the title of a book on a label

題詩.definition: to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy; an inscribed poem
